Clean-O-Waste is a digital platform which supports Swachh Bharat Abhiyaan which is a mission led by our Honorable Prime Minister Mr. Narendra Modi.
 We basically focus on providing Online Waste Management System to citizens through their smartphones, by just clicking the photo of the garbage lying in your area and acknowledging the government. 
So, let's just CLICK THE WASTE!
